name: Kotaro's Revenge
description:
Kotaro's Revenge is a 3D brawler in which you use your a sword and a grappling hook to avenge your sensei in a cyberpunk city. 

Kotaro's Revenge is a student project made in 3 month with 4 Game Designers

Credits:
